articles.title: Intel Worked With Chinese Firms Sanctioned For Enabling Human Rights Abuses - Forbes
articles.description: As the U.S. government takes a 10% stake in Intel, Forbes has learned the tech company partnered with sanctioned Chinese surveillance firms Uniview, Hikvision and Cloudwalk.
articles.content: On Friday, President Donald Trump announced that the U.S. government would take a 10% stake in the hardware manufacturer Intel, involving the government in the private tech industry in a new, unprece… [+7994 chars]
